trans-unit.source: Represents a list of alternative words or phrases, any one of which may be used to match speech input.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma lista de alternativas palavras ou frases reconhecíveis, qualquer uma das quais pode ser utilizada para corresponder à entrada de voz.

trans-unit.source: A SrgsOneOf object contains a list of alternative words or phrases, any one of which may be recognized when spoken.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de SrgsOneOf contém uma lista de alternativas palavras ou frases reconhecíveis, qualquer um dos quais reconhecíveis quando a autenticação ditas.

trans-unit.source: You can build lists of alternatives from arrays of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects or arrays of <xref:System.String> objects.
trans-unit.target: Pode criar listas de alternativas de matrizes de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>objetos ou as matrizes de <xref:System.String>objetos.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf.Items%2A> property to access the alternative items in the list.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf.Items%2A>propriedade acedam aos alternativos itens na lista.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SrgsOneOf class represents the `one-of` element from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: O representa de classe SrgsOneOf o `one-of` elemento a partir do Consortium a World Wide Web (W3C) [especificação de gramática de reconhecimento de voz (SRGS) versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: For information about the SRGS `one-of` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [one-of Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/643cee6b-5082-46ea-9fc1-9f3646a95801).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o SRGS `one-of` elemento e obter detalhes sobre o suporte por System.Speech, consulte [uma-do elemento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/643cee6b-5082-46ea-9fc1-9f3646a95801).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"></xref> class from an array of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"> </xref> classe a partir de uma matriz de <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The alternative items to add.
trans-unit.target: Os itens alternativos para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: items is .
trans-unit.target: itemsis .

trans-unit.source: Any element in the items array is .
trans-unit.target: Qualquer elemento no items matriz é .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"></xref> class from an array of <xref:System.String> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"> </xref> classe a partir de uma matriz de <xref:System.String>objetos.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The alternative items to add.
trans-unit.target: Os itens alternativos para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: items is .
trans-unit.target: itemsis .

trans-unit.source: Any element in the items array is .
trans-unit.target: Qualquer elemento no items matriz é .

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> containing a word or a phrase to the list of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"> </xref> que contém uma palavra ou frase de acesso à lista de alternativas.

trans-unit.source: The item to add to the list of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: O item para adicionar à lista de alternativas.

trans-unit.source: item is .
trans-unit.target: itemis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of all the alternatives contained in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de todas as alternativas contidos no <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The alternative words and phrases returned by this property may have been added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> or <xref:System.String> objects.
trans-unit.target: A alternativas palavras e expressões devolvidos por esta propriedade poderão ter sido adicionados para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>como <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>ou <xref:System.String>objetos.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a lista de alternativas.
